title: 7/29/22 ADN EVENING NEWS LINEUP
cleaned_text:
WELCOME TO THE ADN COMMUNITY.

I am AmiTiel and this is American Digital News for Friday 7/29/22.

1a.📌TAVISTOCK/GENDER CHANGING CLINIC Controversial Tavistock gender clinic for children to shut after damning report | Daily Mail Online The gender identity service at Tavistock & Portman NHS Foundation Trust will be replaced by regional centres. Former patient Keira Bell claims she was rushed into taking puberty blocking drugs.

Of course Tavistock is deeply involved in the upside down shenanigans of manufactured gender confusion; it’s part of the long term plan to control the global populace. And this bit of propaganda? Is just noting the gender fusion implementation being spread even further with the creation of multiple centers, thereby becoming more difficult to manage or monitor.

For anyone unfamiliar with Tavistock’s long-con, I’m going to re-up an old dig in a bit because they’re beyond evil.

The gender identity service at Tavistock & Portman NHS Foundation Trust will be replaced by regional centres at existing children’s hospitals, which will provide more holistic care with ‘strong links to mental health services’.

2a. 📌BIDEN EO ELECTIONS Biden’s Executive Order Put in Place to Stop the Red Wave from Coming Ashore in November THE GATEWAY PUNDIT Biden is doing everything he can to stop the red wave from coming ashore this November.

Biden issued an Executive Order in March 2021, only a few days after stealing the 2020 Election, to steal elections into the future. One section in the order dealt with allowing third-party organizations (like Zuckerbucks) to infiltrate elections like they did in 2020.

3a📌UKRAINE Ukraine army denies striking civilian infrastructure, POWs – Insider Paper Kyiv denied Friday its forces had struck a prison holding Ukrainian prisoners of war, after Moscow said an attack on a jail in rebel-held territory had left dozens dead and many more injured.

b📌UKRAINE/RUSSIA UPDATE Moscow launches missile attack on Ukraine from neighboring Belarus – Washington Times Russia targeted regions in northern Ukraine with a barrage of missiles fired from neighboring Belarus as Kyiv appears to be preparing for offensive operations in the southern part of the country.

4.📌RUSSIA/CHINA SOLIDARITY OVER TAIWAN Russia expresses solidarity with China over Taiwan – Insider Paper The Kremlin expressed “solidarity” on Friday with China’s stance on Taiwan after Chinese President Xi Jinping warned US leader Joe Biden not to “play with fire” over the self-ruled island. “Certainly we are in solidarity,” Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov told reporters.

5.📌PELOSI VISIT TO TAIWAN/CONTRADICTION BASED ON WH VIEWS No Sign Of Chinese Buildup Ahead Of Potential Pelosi Trip To Taiwan: White House INSIDER PAPER The White House on Friday said it sees no sign of increased military activity by China ahead of a potential trip there by a top US politician, despite Beijing warning Washington against playing “with fire.”

b📌CHINA TO US ON PELOSI VISIT-BREAKING: China just issued a warning for US:

“A visit to Taiwan by Speaker Pelosi would challenge China’s red line, and any challenge to our red line will no doubt be met with resolute countermeasures.” Telegram: Contact @insiderpaper

6.📌PELOSI TRIP TO TAIWAN HEATING UP Pelosi’s Taiwan Visit Getting Heated: US Nuclear Carrier Faces Off Against Chinese Warships THE WESTERN JOURNAL Amid escalating tensions between Taiwan and China, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi was scheduled to set off Friday on a tour of several Asian nations — possibly including Taiwan. In light of that, the aircraft carrier USS Ronald Reagan sailed near the hotly contested Fiery Cross Reef in the South China Sea, the South China Morning Post reported Friday.

7.📌GERMANY CUTTING BACK ON AMMONIA PRODUCTION/THIS COULD DEVASTATE FARMERS Farmers’ Worst Nightmare: Largest Chemical Producer Announces Major Cuts to Key Fertilizer Ingredient THE WESTERN JOURNAL The world’s largest chemical company is cutting the production of a key ingredient in fertilizer, potentially causing ramifications for farmers and the global food supply. The German firm BASF announced they’re cutting back on production of ammonia in a Wednesday media call after an earnings report, according to Reuters.

8.📌ABORTION SICK: Democrats Draft Bill to Fund Abortions Overseas THE GATEWAY PUNDIT Since the decision to overturn Roe v. Wade, the Democrats are doing all they can to legitimize abortions in the US. Now the Democrats want to pay for abortions overseas. These people are sick. As soon as Roe v. Wade was overturned, the Democrats panicked. They think pushing abortions is a political winner.

9.📌ABUSE/TRAFFICKING THE FINAL CHAPTER – EPSTEIN’S SEX CLIENTS: Gateway Pundit Files Legal Action to Unseal and Identify The Global Elite Scumbags That Abused Trafficked Minors THE GATEWAY PUNDIT Where are you, New York Times? Where are you, CNN? Where are you, Fox News? It’s almost like corporate media is protecting the disgusting sexual abusers, simply because the victims alleged Epstein’s clients consisted of powerful businessmen, politicians, former presidents and prime ministers, and other world leaders.

10.📌ELECTION 2020 Aerospace Engineer and Former State Senator Patrick Colbeck Releases a Must-Read: “The 2020 Coup, What Happened. What We Must Do” THE GATEWAY PUNDIT “We all need to get out of our comfort zone and stick up for the truth regardless of insults and false accusations. Others before us have sacrificed much more in the cause of liberty.”

And beside this, giving all diligence, add to your faith virtue; and to virtue knowledge; and to knowledge temperance; and to temperance patience; and to patience godliness; and to godliness brotherly kindness; and to brotherly kindness charity.

1.📌MATT GAETZ CALLING OUT DOJ “Do You Guys Call Joe Biden ‘The Big Guy’ at the Department of Justice?” – Matt Gaetz GRILLS Senior DOJ Official About Whistleblower Allegations That FBI Covered Up Hunter Biden’s Crimes THE GATEWAY PUNDIT This week, Republican Senator Chuck Grassley blew the lid off of the Hunter Biden saga when he exposed a number of senior FBI personnel who, by whistleblower accounts, are alleged to have egregiously abused their law enforcement powers in order to cover up Hunter Biden’s criminal enterprise.

📌UPDATE STORY/2A/GOHMERT Louie Gohmert goes ballistic at House Democrat who fact-checked GOP talking points SMARTNEWS/ALTERNET The Republican outrage was described as a “small political side circus,” after U.S. Rep. David Cicilline (D-RI) succeeded in having several fact-checking articles exposing Republicans’ false claims made part of the Congressional Record.

2.📌New York Judge Throws Out State’s Quarantine Camp Law Declaring It Unenforceable RESIST THE MAINSTREAM A New York judge overturned a law that allowed the state government to place even healthy citizens in quarantine camps for an indefinite time without review.

3.📌IRAN Iran Executes Three Women In Single Day: NGO INSIDER PAPER Iran this week executed three women in the space of a single day, all on charges of murdering their husbands, an NGO said on Friday.

4.📌CV19 “He’s Not The Same Anymore” – Mom Sues LAUSD after Officials at Barack Obama Academy Allegedly Bribed Her Son Into Taking the Experimental Vaccine Behind Her Back, Causing Him to Suffer Serious Side Effects THE GATEWAY PUNDIT As if US public health ‘experts’ ‘approving’ the experimental jab for children (who have an astonishing 99.995% or higher recovery rate from Covid-19) wasn’t bad enough, radical activists masquerading as ‘educators’ are actively attempting to subvert the will of American parents by manipulating young students into taking the vaccine without parental consent.

5.📌CANADA Family told autopsy results for 14-year-old who died unexpectedly could take up to a year | CBC News A Winnipeg family says they’ve been told they may have to wait as long as a year to find out what caused their 14-year-old daughter’s death.

6.📌DA RELEASES PERSON THAT BEAT COP Far-Left Manhattan DA Defends Releasing Teen *With Prior Felony Arrests* Who Brutally Beat Cop THE GATEWAY PUNDIT A 16-year-old boy with prior felony assaults was captured on video brutally beating a cop last weekend. The teen felon got the cop in a chokehold. Far-left Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg recommended the teen, who was charged with second-degree assault for Saturday’s attack, be released without bail.

7.📌ENGLAND’S RUGBY FOOTBALL UNION/LGBTQ English Rugby Codes Ban Transgender Players From Women’s Game INSIDER PAPER Transgender players have been barred from competing in both English women’s rugby union and rugby league matches, it was announced Friday.

8.📌FDA, CDC Sold Out America’s Children — Could Their Betrayal Bring Down the Entire Childhood Vaccine Program?
• Children’s Health Defense THE DEFENDER By authorizing COVID-19 vaccines for young children on the basis of shoddy data, public health officials proved they’re in the business of protecting pharma’s profits, not people — and once enough people realize it, the entire childhood vaccine program will be finished.

9.📌CHINA BOUGHT $6.1 BILLION IN US PROPERTY THIS YEAR In the Past Year, Chinese Investors Purchased $6.1 BILLION Worth of Property in The US After Being Banned by Other Countries for Pushing Up House Prices THE GATEWAY PUNDIT This week, a report by The National Association of Realtors (NAR) revealed that activity from foreign real estate buyers increased substantially for the first time in three years.

10.📌ZELDIN/NY ELECTION NY governor has the ‘authority’ and ‘obligation’ to remove Manhattan’s District Attorney Alvin Bragg: Zeldin FOX BUSINESS During an interview on “Mornings with Maria,” Thursday, New York gubernatorial candidate and Rep. Lee Zeldin previews the action program he intends to implement the “first day” he potentially takes office as the governor of New York. NY governor has the ‘authority’ and ‘obligation’ to remove Manhattan’s District Attorney Alvin Bragg: Zeldin

Good Morning Patriots Happy Friday Plastic Girl Reporting here today’s top story includes that everyone knows that Epstein and his partner Ghislaine Maxwell were degenerate villains who groomed and trafficked young girls to be used and abused by Epstein, his clients, and friends.

Epstein famously died by “suicide” before he could go to trial. However, Ghislaine Maxwell was convicted of sex trafficking minors in December of 2021. No less than 23 women testified in court that Epstein trafficked and abused them. Four specifically testified they were abused by Maxwell as well.

But even today, the identities of Epstein’s Sex Clients remain totally unknown. Stunningly, no media outlet in the country has petitioned the Court to unseal the identities of Epstein’s Clients.

It’s almost like corporate media is protecting the disgusting sexual abusers, simply because the victims alleged Epstein’s clients consisted of powerful businessmen, politicians, former presidents and prime ministers, and other world leaders.

Gateway Pundit is about to change this. Gateway Pundit lawyers Marc Randazza and Jay Wolman of the Randazza Legal Group, along with GP General Counsel John Burns filed a motion to intervene in the Guiffre v. Maxwell case in the United States District Court for the District of New York.

GP is asking the Court to unseal all records identifying Epstein’s Sex Clients.

📉 Facebook revenue dropped for the first time ever

🚨 New York State declares monkeypox an imminent threat to public health

☣️San Francisco authorities have declared a state of emergency over monkeypox

😵‍💫CDC issues alert after potentially deadly bacteria found in US soil and water for first time

🤡Biden says US economy ‘on the right path’ despite GDP dip

🥴Joe Biden had a call with Chinese President Xi yesterday, and according to a Chinese readout of the call, Xi warned Biden that “Those who play with fire will perish by it.” [Reuters]

🚢North American port congestion has just re-entered record territory. As of Thursday morning, there were 153, the majority off East and Gulf Coast ports. [CNBC]

🤮A woman who left her newborn baby in a trash bin pleaded guilty to attempted murder and child abuse, agreeing to a seven-year prison sentence and potential deportation[The Epoch Times]

💰A new report has shed light on how cartels are making billions of dollars a year smuggling migrants across the southern border. According to the New York Times report Monday, cartels are earning an estimated $13 billion annually from the illicit practice. Revenue soared from an estimated $500 million back in 2018 as cartels have ramped up their involvement in human smuggling operations over the past few years.[OANN]

😵‍Saudi Arabia Unveils Plans For Dystopian “Linear” City That Will Cram 9 Million People Into a Giant 109-Mile-Long Mirrored Wall

🎥My Bad. I’m Sorry” Whoopi Goldberg Gives Half-Ass Apology After Tying Turning Point USA To Nazis On The Air
